question: Who has been named the Asian Player of the Year 2016 in the senior men's category by the Asian Hockey Federation (AHF)?
explanation: India forward SV Sunil has been named the Asian Player of the Year 2016 in the senior men\'s category by the Asian Hockey Federation (AHF). SV Sunil played a vital role in team India\'s successful outing at 2016 FIH Champions Trophy in London where he led the forwardline and was instrumental in the team\'s historic Silver medal winning performance. Apart from him, Harmanpreet Singh has been named the \'Promising Player of the Year 2016\' in the junior men\'s category.
